Absolute Reality.quote: "That which is the finest essence - this whole world has that as its soul. That is Reality. That is Truth. That art Thou." (Chandogya Upanishad 6.8.7)

Divine Presence.quote: "Closer is He than breathing, and nearer than hands and feet." (Tennyson, inspired by Acts 17:28)

Eternal Now.quote: "I am the same yesterday, today, and forever." (Hebrews 13:8)

Infinite Being.quote: "There is nothing but the infinite divine Existence." (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Divine Immanence.quote: "Do I not fill heaven and earth?" declares the Lord. (Jeremiah 23:24)

Divine Transcendence.quote: "Higher than the highest, vaster than the vastest." (Katha Upanishad 2.20)

Ultimate Truth.quote: "I am the way, the truth, and the life." (John 14:6)

Divine Essence.quote: "God is the essence of all essences." (Meister Eckhart)

Absolute Freedom.quote: "Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom." (2 Corinthians 3:17)

Divine Unity.quote: "All things are one in Allah's unity." (Ibn Arabi)

Divine Actuality.quote: "In Him we live and move and have our being." (Acts 17:28)

Perfect Being.quote: "Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect." (Matthew 5:48)

Divine Self.quote: "Atman is Brahman - The individual self is the universal Self." (Mandukya Upanishad)

Absolute Knowledge.quote: "He knows what lies before them and what lies behind them." (Quran 2:255)

Divine Light.quote: "God is light, and in Him there is no darkness at all." (1 John 1:5)

Supreme Reality.quote: "That supreme Brahman is infinite, and this conditioned Brahman is infinite." (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 5.1)

Divine Completeness.quote: "I am the fullness that fills all in all." (Ephesians 1:23)

Eternal Truth.quote: "The Real cannot be created or destroyed." (Bhagavad Gita 2:16)

Divine Presence.quote: "Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence?" (Psalm 139:7)

Absolute Love.quote: "God is love, and whoever abides in love abides in God." (1 John 4:16)

Divine Will.quote: "Not my will, but Thine be done." (Luke 22:42)

Supreme Good.quote: "None is good save one, that is, God." (Mark 10:18)

Divine Beauty.quote: "One is the Beautiful, in whom all things beautiful are contained." (Plotinus, Enneads)

Divine Wisdom.quote: "The wisdom that comes from above is first pure, then peaceable." (James 3:17)

Eternal Life.quote: "This is eternal life, that they know you, the only true God." (John 17:3)

Divine Order.quote: "He has made everything beautiful in its time." (Ecclesiastes 3:11)

Absolute Peace.quote: "Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you." (John 14:27)
